metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15092 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A cross-site scripting issue has been found in the web interface ofPowerDNS Recursor from 4.0.0 up to and including 4.0.6, where the qname ofDNS queries was displayed without any escaping, allowing a remote attackerto inject HTML and Javascript code into the web interface, altering thecontent.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
